body:
Sometimes AI pays for changing equipment from one creature to another, then immediately change this very equipment back, or to yet another creature.

This could go as long as AI has mana.

Usually this re-equip is pointless.
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Odd AI: re-equip creatures until no mana left
content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 23, 2013 01:11:54_

Sometimes AI pays for changing equipment from one creature to another, then immediately change this very equipment back, or to yet another creature.

This could go as long as AI has mana.

Usually this re-equip is pointless.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=393_
